performance_progress: Sofia is a dedicated student who attends regularly and completes assignments. She demonstrates strong oral comprehension and ideas but struggles to organize and edit written work independently. English is her second language; she benefits from visuals, sentence frames, and exemplars.

education_goals.academic: By June 2026, Sofia will plan, draft, and revise multi-paragraph compositions using graphic organizers and assistive technology, achieving at least 70% on 4 out of 5 major assignments.
education_goals.social: Sofia will participate in peer feedback sessions by giving one constructive comment and one positive comment in 4 out of 5 observed tasks.
education_goals.behavioural: Sofia will submit major assignments by the negotiated due date in 4 out of 5 cases with supports.
education_goals.communicative: Sofia will use subject-specific vocabulary in spoken and written responses with visual prompts in 4 out of 5 opportunities.

accommodations.instructional:
Provide sentence frames and exemplars.
Use graphic organizers for planning.
Pre-teach key vocabulary with visuals.
accommodations.environmental:
Quiet workspace for extended writing.
Check-ins at start and mid-point of work periods.
accommodations.assessment:
Allow use of word processor with spell-check.
Provide extended time and chunked deadlines.
Use rubrics shared in advance.
accommodations.technology:
Laptop with word prediction.
Access to translation support for key terms when appropriate.

assessments: School-based learning assessment (Jan 2025) shows average reasoning skills and significant difficulty with written expression and spelling under time pressure.
transition_goals:
Short-term: build confidence in written tasks using structured supports.
Long-term: prepare for post-secondary pathways that value her bilingual skills.
